title: 1.8官服+forge+海绵forge服务器报错
author: XiSir
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-1-10 22:56 编辑 

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  SpongeCoremod (sponge-1.8-1371-2.1DEV-472.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// I feel sad now :(
